info.name: Dynapi API
info.description: Dynapi backend API collection with success and error scenario examples for every active endpoint. Includes app-level error envelopes (400/403/404/500) and endpoint-specific success examples.

item.name: 01 Start Here - Schema Bootstrap (Admin)
item.description: Create schema definitions and groups first before submitting/querying data.

request.description: Issues a local development JWT and stores it into {{adminToken}} via test script.

item.name: 03 Query Data (Public)
item.description: Query submitted records using filters, sort, and pagination.

request.description: Query dynamic records with guarded filters, sorting, and pagination.
